fileUpload.dragDrop: Drag & drop or click to browse

auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to access your dashboard
auth.name: Name
auth.termsAgreement: By creating an account, you agree to our

hero.headline: Hire Elite Candidates
hero.subheadline: Say goodbye to spending long hours going through piles of resumes. Our AI hiring agent vets candidates, conducts interviews, and delivers comprehensive evaluation reports automatically.

services.title: Two Powerful Ways to Hire
services.subtitle: Choose the solution that fits your needs - or use both for maximum efficiency.

hiring.title: Start Hiring
hiring.subtitle: AI Hiring Agent
hiring.description: Let AI handle the heavy lifting. Our hiring agent screens resumes, conducts interviews, and delivers evaluation reports automatically. Focus on what matters - meeting great candidates.

api.title: RoboHire API
api.subtitle: For Developers
api.description: Integrate powerful AI recruitment capabilities into your existing systems. Parse resumes, match candidates, evaluate interviews, and more with our comprehensive API suite.

howItWorks.title: How RoboHire Works
howItWorks.subtitle: We use AI to act as a hiring agent that vets each resume, contacts and interviews matched candidates, and sends you comprehensive evaluation reports automatically.

step1.title: Set Up Your Job Opening
step1.description: Describe your ideal candidate or upload a job description. Specify must-have skills, experience requirements, and nice-to-haves. We handle the rest.

step2.title: Plug Into Your Workflow
step2.description: Integrate with your existing ATS via API or webhooks. No heavy lifting required - just point your candidate pipeline to RoboHire and we take over.

step3.title: Receive Best Matches
step3.description: Our AI screens every application, conducts initial interviews, and ranks candidates by fit. You only spend time with the right people.

step4.title: Get Instant Reports
step4.description: Receive comprehensive evaluation reports via webhook. Know exactly why each candidate is a match - skills assessment, interview analysis, and hiring recommendations.

features.title: Everything You Need to Hire Smarter
features.subtitle: From AI screening to automated interviews, we provide all the tools to transform your hiring process.

aiScreening.title: AI Resume Screening
aiScreening.description: Our AI analyzes every resume against your requirements, identifying must-have skills, experience gaps, and hidden potential.

autoInterviews.title: Automated Interviews
autoInterviews.description: AI conducts initial screening interviews 24/7, asking relevant questions and evaluating responses in real-time.

evalReports.title: Evaluation Reports
evalReports.description: Get comprehensive reports with skill assessments, interview analysis, strengths, weaknesses, and hiring recommendations.

timeSavings.title: 90% Time Savings
timeSavings.description: Stop spending hours reviewing mismatched candidates. Focus your time only on the best fits for your team.

apiAccess.title: Developer API
apiAccess.description: Full REST API access for parsing, matching, and evaluation. Integrate AI hiring capabilities into your existing systems.

webhooks.title: Webhook Delivery
webhooks.description: Receive shortlisted candidates and evaluation reports automatically via webhooks. Seamless integration with your workflow.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Support for 7 languages including English, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, French, Portuguese, and German.

cheatingDetection.title: Cheating Detection
cheatingDetection.description: Advanced AI analysis to detect AI-assisted answers, ensuring you evaluate genuine candidate capabilities.

cta.title: Ready to Hire Smarter?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of companies using AI to find elite candidates faster. Start your free trial today - no credit card required.

footer.tagline: AI-powered hiring platform that helps you find and hire elite candidates before others.

hiring.welcome:
Welcome! I'm your AI hiring assistant. Tell me about the role you're hiring for, and I'll help you find the perfect candidates.

You can describe your ideal candidate, paste a job description, or upload a JD file. What are you looking for?
hiring.gotIt: Great! I've captured your requirements. Let me summarize what I understand:
hiring.confirm:
Does this look correct? You can:
- Type 'yes' to start hiring
- Add more details
- Upload a full JD for more context
hiring.moreInfo: That's a good start! Can you tell me more about:
hiring.orUpload: Or you can upload a job description file for more detailed matching.
hiring.loginRequired: To create your hiring request and start receiving candidates, you'll need to sign in first.
hiring.loginPrompt: Click the button below to sign in or create an account. Your hiring requirements will be saved.
hiring.updated: Got it! I've updated your requirements. Ready to start hiring? Type 'yes' to proceed, or continue adding details.
hiring.jdParsed: I've analyzed your job description. Here's what I found:
hiring.jdConfirm: Would you like to proceed with these requirements, or would you like to add any specific criteria?
hiring.success: Your hiring request has been created! ðŸŽ‰
hiring.error: There was an issue creating your request:
hiring.tryAgain: Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
hiring.signInToSave: Sign in to save your hiring request and start receiving candidates.
hiring.helperText: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line. Upload a JD file for more detailed matching.

dashboard.subtitle: Manage your hiring requests and track candidates.

requests.title: Your Hiring Requests
requests.emptyDesc: Create your first hiring request to start finding candidates.

matchResume.title: Match Resume with JD
matchResume.subtitle: Analyze how well a candidate's resume matches a job description
matchResume.resumePlaceholder:
Paste resume content here...

Example:
John Doe
Senior Software Engineer
john.doe@email.com

EXPERIENCE:
Google (2019-2024) - Senior Software Engineer
- Led team of 5 engineers
- Built React dashboard for 10M+ users

SKILLS: Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js, AWS

EDUCATION:
MIT - BS Computer Science, 2017
matchResume.jdPlaceholder:
Paste job description here...

Example:
Senior Software Engineer at TechCorp
Location: San Francisco, CA

About the role:
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to lead our backend team.

Required Qualifications:
- 5+ years of software engineering experience
- Expert-level Python programming
- Strong experience with React

Nice to have:
- AWS or cloud infrastructure experience
- Machine Learning background

Responsibilities:
- Lead technical design decisions
- Mentor junior engineers
matchResume.errorMissing: Please provide both resume and job description

inviteCandidate.title: Invite Candidate to Interview
inviteCandidate.subtitle: Send interview invitation via RoboHire API
inviteCandidate.externalHint: View the actual request sent to RoboHire API for testing
inviteCandidate.interviewerPlaceholder: e.g., Ask about work location preference, salary expectation...
inviteCandidate.recruiterHelp: Used for receiving notifications and as BCC recipient
inviteCandidate.interviewerHelp: Additional requirements for the interview (location, rounds, etc.)
inviteCandidate.resumeLabel: Resume (must include candidate's name and email)
inviteCandidate.resumePlaceholder: Paste resume content here... Must include candidate's name and email address.
inviteCandidate.name: Name
inviteCandidate.errorMissingResumeJd: Please provide both resume and job description
inviteCandidate.tip: Tip: Copy and run this code in your terminal/console to test the RoboHire API directly

parseResume.title: Parse Resume
parseResume.subtitle: Extract structured data from a resume PDF
parseResume.errorMissingFile: Please upload a resume PDF file

parseJd.title: Parse Job Description
parseJd.subtitle: Extract structured data from a JD PDF
parseJd.errorMissingFile: Please upload a job description PDF file

evaluateInterview.title: Evaluate Interview
evaluateInterview.subtitle: Analyze an interview transcript against resume and JD
evaluateInterview.specialInstructionsPlaceholder: Add any special instructions for the evaluation, e.g., 'Focus on system design skills' or 'Pay attention to communication clarity'
evaluateInterview.loadingWithCheating: Evaluating interview and running cheating detection...
evaluateInterview.cheatingIncluded: Cheating detection analysis included in results
evaluateInterview.errorMissingFields: Please provide resume, job description, and interview transcript
